SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! 1 - set the AGENT variable (value or from outside) ! 2 - does the AGENT exist ! 3 - does the objectname end with @TARGET_SYSTEM ! 4 - compare objectname TARGET_SYSTEM with agent variable UC_HOST_JCL_VAR (exception CIT => RA) ! 5 - get AGENT bin directory ! 6 - set LOGIN OBJECT variable (value or from outside) !------------------------------
! 1 a - ensure the AGENT variable is set :SET &AGENT_VALUE# = "AGENT#" :SET &AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&AGENT_VALUE#) :IF &AGENT# = "" : PRINT "HEADER: no agent received" : SET &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 0 :ELSE : PRINT "HEADER: set agent from outside (like RM): &AGENT#" : SET &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 :ENDIF
! 1 b - check whether the AGENT is overwritten (filetransfer for example) :SET &OVERWRITE_AGENT_VALUE# = "OVERWRITE_AGENT#" :SET &OVERWRITE_AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&OVERWRITE_AGENT_VALUE#) :SET &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &OVERWRITE_AGENT#) :IF &OVERWRITE_AGENT# <> "" : PRINT "HEADER: overwrite agent with: &OVERWRITE_AGENT# (&UC4RB_OVERWRITE_AGENT_OS#)" : SET &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_AGENT_OS# : SET &AGENT# = &OVERWRITE_AGENT# :ENDIF
! 2 - check whether the AGENT exists :IF &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OHIDNR# = GET_OH_IDNR(&AGENT#,0000) : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OHIDNR# = 0 !: STOP MSG, 50, "HEADER: host &AGENT# doesnt exist" : PRINT "HEADER: host &AGENT# doesnt exist" : ENDIF :ENDIF
! 3 - check the uc4 object name for "@TARGET_SYSTEM" :IF &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_RBNAME# = SYS_ACT_ME_NAME() : SET &UC4RB_TEMP# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_RBNAME#,"@") : IF &UC4RB_TEMP# = 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "HEADER: runbook without @TARGET_SYSTEM in the name is not allowed" : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_TEMP# = ADD(&UC4RB_TEMP#,1) : SET &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = MID(&UC4RB_RBNAME#,&UC4RB_TEMP#) : IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = "CIT" : SET &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = "RA" : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# <> "RA" OR "WINDOWS" OR "UNIX" : STOP MSG, 50, "HEADER: wrong object name ending. @TARGET_SYSTEM must be RA, WINDOWS or UNIX" : ENDIF : PRINT "HEADER: runbook function for &UC4RB_TARGET_OS#" :ENDIF
! 4 - check whether UC4RB_AGENT_OS is set and compare to the runbook TARGET_OS value :IF &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS_VALUE# = "UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&UC4RB_AGENT_OS_VALUE#) : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "" : PRINT "HEADER: runbook runs stand alone - no OS check" : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# : PRINT "HEADER: check OS successfully - runbook (&UC4RB_TARGET_OS#) runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : ELSE : STOP NOMSG, 50, "HEADER: stop &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# runbook because it's a &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# agent" : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &AGENT# <> "" : PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :ELSE : SET &AGENT# = GET_ATT(HOST) :ENDIF
! 5 - get AGENT bin directory :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BIN', &AGENT#) :PRINT "HEADER: agent bin directory &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#"
! 6a - check if Login os overwritten :SET &OVERWRITE_LOGIN_VALUE# = "OVERWRITE_LOGIN#" :SET &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&OVERWRITE_LOGIN_VALUE#) :IF &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# <> "" : PRINT "HEADER: overwrite login with: &OVERWRITE_LOGIN#" : SET &LOGIN# = &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# :ENDIF
! 6b - set Login Object :SET &LOGIN_VALUE# = "LOGIN#" :SET &LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&LOGIN_VALUE#) :IF &LOGIN# = "" : PRINT "HEADER: no login object received" :ELSE : PRINT "HEADER: set login object from outside (like RM): &LOGIN#" :ENDIF
:IF &LOGIN# <> "" : PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :ELSE : SET &LOGIN# = GET_ATT(LOGIN) :ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI: !Get Operator :set &userid# = SYS_USER_NAME :set &dep# = SYS_USER_DEP :ADD_ATT OPERATOR, '&userid#/&dep#' ! !Get Script :read &UC_CAUSE_NAME,, :read &UC_CAUSE_NR,, :read &UC_CAUSE_STATE,, :read &UC_CAUSE_RETCODE,, ! :set &nl# = UC_CRLF ! :set &parentname# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NAME('ACT') :set &parentnr# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR('ACT') :set &parenttyp# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_TYP('ACT') :set &system# = GET_UC_SYSTEM_NAME :set &client# = SYS_ACT_CLIENT :set &date# = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL() :set &time# = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS") :set &lang# = SYS_USER_LANGUAGE :set &statustext# = get_msg_txt(&UC_CAUSE_STATE,'') ! :if &lang# = 'E' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' Client:'&client#'" : set &date# = conv_date(&date#,"MM/DD/YYYY") : PUT_ATT CALL_TEXT = "An error occurred! &nl# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "UC4 System: &system# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Client: &client# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Object: &UC_CAUSE_NAME &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Run#: &UC_CAUSE_NR &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "State Text: &statustext# (&UC_CAUSE_STATE) &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Retcode: &UC_CAUSE_RETCODE &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Date/Time: &date# &time# &nl# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Parent of this object (if available): &nl# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Parent: &parentname# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Type: &parenttyp# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Run#: &parentnr# &nl#" :endif :if &lang# = 'D' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' Mandant:'&client#'" : set &date# = conv_date(&date#,"DD.MM.YYYY") : PUT_ATT CALL_TEXT = "Ein Fehler ist aufgetreten! NOTIFICATION.Subject: File Transfer Done: &MFTSENDFILE# now in &TPATH#
NOTIFICATION.Text:
Hi,
the File Transfer & Watcher you requested has finished with success:
File &MFTSENDFILE# was successfully moved to: &TPATH#

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
! set variables at runtime & modify attributes :PRINT executing process.. ! Setting Source Field :SET &MFTSENDFILE# = STR_CAT(&SPATH#, "/") :PSET &MFTSENDFILE# = STR_CAT(&MFTSENDFILE#, &SFILE#)
!:PUT_ATT FT_SRC_FILE = &MFTSENDFILE# :PUT_ATT EVENT_FILE_PATH = &MFTSENDFILE#

XHEADER.Title: MFT Many to 1 - Variabilized UNC Path
MFT 1 to Many - Variabilized UNC Path

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! set variables at runtime & modify attributes
! Setting Source Field :SET &MFTSENDFILE# = STR_CAT(&SPATH#, "/") :SET &MFTSENDFILE# = STR_CAT(&MFTSENDFILE#, &SFILE#)
:PUT_ATT FT_SRC_FILE = &MFTSENDFILE#
! Setting Target Field :SET &MFTTARGETFILE# = STR_CAT(&TPATH#, "\*")
:PUT_ATT FT_DST_FILE = &MFTTARGETFILE#

! set variables at runtime & modify attributes
! Setting Source Field :SET &MFTSENDFILE# = STR_CAT(&SPATH#, "/") :SET &MFTSENDFILE# = STR_CAT(&MFTSENDFILE#, &SFILE#)
:PUT_ATT FT_SRC_FILE = &MFTSENDFILE#
! Setting Target Field :SET &MFTTARGETFILE# = STR_CAT(&TPATH#, "\&SFILE#")
:PUT_ATT FT_DST_FILE = &MFTTARGETFILE#

! set variables at runtime & modify attributes
:SET &MFTTARGETFILE# = STR_CAT(&TPATH#, "\&SFILE#")
:PUT_ATT FT_SRC_FILE = &MFTSENDFILE# :PUT_ATT FT_DST_FILE = &MFTTARGETFILE#

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :ATTACH_RES "GE.STORE.UPD.CONN", "*", C java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#CONN_Update.jar -P &AE_PORT# -L &AE_LOGIN# -W &AE_PWD# -C &AE_CLIENT# -D &AE_DEP# -H localhost -name "GE.CONN.WS.REST.CDN" -ra_updval ["accessKey","&CDN_ACCESS_KEY_ID#"] -commit java -jar &$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#CONN_Update.jar -P &AE_PORT# -L &AE_LOGIN# -W &AE_PWD# -C &AE_CLIENT# -D &AE_DEP# -H localhost -name "GE.CONN.WS.REST.CDN" -ra_updval ["secretAccessKey","&CDN_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY#"] -commit

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :PRINT Domain Name Extracted: &CDN_DOMAINNAME# :PRINT Dstribution ID: &CDN_DISTRID# :PRINT Status: &CDN_STATUS#

:SET &BNAME# = "/pgp" !:SET &URL# = "https://prd-pw-microsites-us1n.s3.amazonaws.com/pgp/automictest3.gepower.com/" :DEFINE &PRODURLS#, string, 2 :DEFINE &STAGEURLS#, string, 2 :FILL &PRODURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&PRODURL#,&BNAME#) :FILL &STAGEURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&STAGEURL#,&BNAME#)
:PSET &BASEPRODURL# = &PRODURLS#[1] :PSET &BASESTAGEURL# = &STAGEURLS#[1]
:PSET &SHORTBASEPRODURL# = STR_SUB(&BASEPRODURL#,"https://","") :PSET &SHORTBASESTAGEURL# = STR_SUB(&BASESTAGEURL#,"https://","")
:PSET &EXTPRODURL# = STR_CAT(&BNAME#,&PRODURLS#[2]) :PSET &EXTSTAGEURL# = STR_CAT(&BNAME#,&STAGEURLS#[2]) :PRINT "Short Stage URL is: &SHORTBASESTAGEURL#" :PRINT "Short Prod URL is: &SHORTBASEPRODURL#" :PRINT "Extended Stage URL is &EXTSTAGEURL#" :PRINT "Extended Prod URL is &EXTPRODURL#"

:SET &BNAME# = "/pgp" !:SET &URL# = "https://prd-pw-microsites-us1n.s3.amazonaws.com/pgp/automictest3.gepower.com/" :DEFINE &PRODURLS#, string, 2 :DEFINE &STAGEURLS#, string, 2 :FILL &PRODURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&PRODURL#,&BNAME#) :FILL &STAGEURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&STAGEURL#,&BNAME#)
:PSET &BASEPRODURL# = &PRODURLS#[1] :PSET &BASESTAGEURL# = &STAGEURLS#[1]
:PSET &SHORTBASEPRODURL# = STR_SUB(&BASEPRODURL#,"https://","") :PSET &SHORTBASESTAGEURL# = STR_SUB(&BASESTAGEURL#,"https://","")
:PSET &EXTPRODURL# = STR_CAT(&BNAME#,&PRODURLS#[2]) :PSET &EXTSTAGEURL# = STR_CAT(&BNAME#,&STAGEURLS#[2])
:PSET &SHORTEXTPRODURL# = STR_SUB(&EXTPRODURL#,".com/",".com") :PSET &SHORTEXTSTAGEURL# = STR_SUB(&EXTSTAGEURL#,".com/",".com")
:PSET &BASEPRODID# = STR_SUB(&SHORTBASEPRODURL#,".s3.amazonaws.com","") :PSET &BASESTAGEID# = STR_SUB(&SHORTBASESTAGEURL#,".s3.amazonaws.com","") !:PUBLISH &SHORTBASEPRODURL# !:PUBLISH &BASESTAGEURL# !:PUBLISH &SHORTBASEPRODURL# !:PUBLISH &SHORTBASESTAGEURL# !:PUBLISH &EXTPRODURL# !:PUBLISH &EXTSTAGEURL#
:PRINT "Short Stage URL is: &SHORTBASESTAGEURL#" :PRINT "Short Prod URL is: &SHORTBASEPRODURL#" :PRINT "Extended Stage URL is &EXTSTAGEURL#" :PRINT "Extended Prod URL is &EXTPRODURL#"

:SET &BNAME# = "/pgp" !:SET &URL# = "https://prd-pw-microsites-us1n.s3.amazonaws.com/pgp/automictest3.gepower.com/" :DEFINE &PRODURLS#, string, 2 :DEFINE &STAGEURLS#, string, 2 :FILL &PRODURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&PRODURL#,&BNAME#) :FILL &STAGEURLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&STAGEURL#,&BNAME#)
:PSET &BASEPRODURL# = &PRODURLS#[1] :PSET &BASESTAGEURL# = &STAGEURLS#[1]
:PSET &SHORTBASEPRODURL# = STR_SUB(&BASEPRODURL#,"https://","") :PSET &SHORTBASESTAGEURL# = STR_SUB(&BASESTAGEURL#,"https://","")
:PSET &EXTPRODURL# = STR_CAT(&BNAME#,&PRODURLS#[2]) :PSET &EXTSTAGEURL# = STR_CAT(&BNAME#,&STAGEURLS#[2]) :PRINT "Short Stage URL is: &SHORTBASESTAGEURL#" :PRINT "Short Prod URL is: &SHORTBASEPRODURL#" :PRINT "Extended Stage URL is &EXTSTAGEURL#" :PRINT "Extended Prod URL is &EXTPRODURL#"

ssh tbd.dev.iaah.local java jar -DsomeProperties /opt/jobs/generateDeliveryNotes.jar

XHEADER.Title: Check that a given host is reachable

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
echo off ping &EC2_PRIVATE_IP# @set RETCODE=%errorlevel%
IF "%RETCODE%" EQU "0" ( echo HOST REACHABLE exit 0 ) IF "%RETCODE%" NEQ "0" ( echo HOST UNREACHABLE exit 1 )

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :PRINT Current Status of Image ID &INSTANCEID#: &STATUS# :IF &STATUS# <> "running" : PRINT Instance is not in RUNNING state. : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="EC2 Instance not in Running state" : PRINT Exit with RETCODE 1800 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1800 :ELSE : PRINT EC2 Instance is in RUNNING state. :ENDIF

XHEADER.Title: Publish Agent Name calculated from EC2 DNS Name

SCRIPT.MSCRI: : DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 5 : FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&PRIVATE_DNS_NAME#,".") : SET &AGENTNAME# = CONV_UC(&STRINGS#[1]) : PUBLISH &AGENTNAME#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &STATUS#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &LAUNCH_TIME#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &INSTANCE_ID#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &PRIVATE_DNS_NAME#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUBLISH &PRIVATE_IP#,,"WORKFLOW" ! Printing Published Variables : PRINT "Agent Name = &AGENTNAME#" : PRINT "Image Status = &STATUS#" : PRINT "Launch Time = &LAUNCH_TIME#" : PRINT "Instance ID = &INSTANCE_ID#" : PRINT "Private DNS Name = &PRIVATE_DNS_NAME#" : PRINT "Private IP Adr = &PRIVATE_IP#"

XHEADER.Title: Custom Risk Reporting Process Dashboard Workflow
Custom Risk Reporting Process Dashboard Workflow
Standard Risk Reporting Process Dashboard Workflow
Standard Risk Reporting Process Dashboard Workflow

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#); :IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF
:IF &END_CHAR# <> "/" OR "\" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "/") :ENDIF

:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" ! @echo off : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" cd "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS : ELSE cd /d "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" cd $HOME :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX cd "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF

:SET &IS_EXT# = STR_FIND(&INPUT_PARAM#, "EXT:") ! &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# must be declared beforehand. :IF &IS_EXT# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&INPUT_PARAM# is not valid. Maybe the value has not been passed from ARA." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER : SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 ! : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" ! : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" ! $errors = 100 ! : ELSE ! set /a errors=100 ! : ENDIF ! : ENDIF ! : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" ! errors=100 ! : ENDIF :ENDIF
!checks the return code and if it is greater than &ALLOWEDMAXRC# exits the job RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "&ALLOWEDMAXRC#" ] ; then exit $RC; fi :SET &ALLOWEDMAXRC# = 0

!Prevent the problem with java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar" "C:\test\" !"C:\test\" will be understand as C:\test" -> wrong folder name
:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#) :IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF :IF &END_CHAR# = "\" : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &LENGTH#) : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "/") :ENDIF

:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "\", "/") :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#) :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.REMOVE_TRAILING_SLASH

:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "/", "\") :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#) :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.REMOVE_TRAILING_SLASH
:SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&ABSOLUTE_PATH#, "/") :IF &pos# <> 1 : SET &ABSOLUTE_PATH# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#/&ABSOLUTE_PATH#" :ENDIF
:SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&ABSOLUTE_PATH#, ":") :IF &pos# <> 2 : SET &ABSOLUTE_PATH# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#\&ABSOLUTE_PATH#" :ENDIF
:IF &variablePath# = "" : PRINT "Use default temp vara location" : SET &variablePath# = "PACKAGES/APPDATA/TEMP/VARIABLES" :ENDIF :SET &ret# = CREATE_OBJECT("VARA","&variableName#","&variablePath#")

:SET &DECRYPT_COMMAND# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar" ARB -cmd cipher decrypt "&UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#"'
:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=((&DECRYPT_COMMAND# | findstr.exe /B Decrypted:).substring(11)).Trim() :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS : ELSE SetLocal EnableDelayedExpansion for /F "tokens=1 delims=^" %%a IN ('&DECRYPT_COMMAND# ^| findstr.exe /B Decrypted:') DO ( set UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=%%a set UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=!UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD:~11! ) SetLocal DisableDelayedExpansion :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=`&DECRYPT_COMMAND# | grep "^Decrypted: " | sed 's/^Decrypted: //'` :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF
if [ -d "&DIRECTORY#" ] ; then echo "&DIRECTORY# directory already exists" else mkdir -p "&DIRECTORY#" fi

! not complete, more characters might need a escape sequence :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '\', '\\') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '\"') !:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "'", "'\''")

:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '^', '^^') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '|', '^|') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '&', '^&') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '>', '^>') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '<', '^<') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '%', '%%') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '\"')
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_QUOTED_STRING#, '"', '\"')

! Escape trailing slash in windows command in case of path to file or folder as C: and C:\, escape by convert to C:\\ :SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#); :IF &LENGTH# = 2 OR 3 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : IF &END_CHAR# = ":" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "\\") : ENDIF : IF &END_CHAR# = "\" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "\") : ENDIF :ENDIF

! not complete, more characters might need a escape sequence :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, ' ', '%20') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '#', '%23') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '$', '%24') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '%', '%25') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '&', '%26') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '@', '%40') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '`', '%60') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '/', '%2F') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "\", '%5C') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, ':', '%3A') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, ';', '%3B') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '<', '%3C') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '=', '%3D') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '>', '%3E') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '?', '%3F') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '[', '%5B') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, ']', '%5D') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '^', '%5E') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '{', '%7B') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '}', '%7D') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '|', '%7C') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '~', '%7E') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '%22') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, "'", '%27') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '+', '%2B') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, ',', '%2C')

:IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &SEPARATOR_CHAR# = "\" :ELSE : SET &SEPARATOR_CHAR# = "/" :ENDIF
! Warning, this script doesn't work with Windows Universal Naming Convention :FILL &STRING_ARR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = ""
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRING_ARR#[])
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" <> ".." OR "." OR "" : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &STRING_ARR#[&VAR#] : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ENDIF : ELSE : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" EQ ".." : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) : SET &POS# = &POS# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &POS#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE
$scripts = "VMware\Infrastructure\vSphere PowerCLI\Scripts" $env:Path = "${env:Path};${env:ProgramFiles}\$scripts;${env:ProgramFiles(x86)}\$scripts" . Initialize-PowerCLIEnvironment.ps1

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "ERROR:" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "ERROR" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING#[&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER#]: &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING#[&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER#]: &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING#[&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER#]: &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF

:SET &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD = "echo" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD = "Write-Host" : ENDIF :ENDIF &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "********************************" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "** EXECUTION START **" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "********************************" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD ""

:SET &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD = "echo" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD = "Write-Host" : ENDIF :ENDIF &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "********************************" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "** PARAMETER VALIDATION START **" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "********************************" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD ""

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "INFO:" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "PARAM:" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF

!get the agent OS type :SET &AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("AGENT#")
:IF &AGENT# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting agent to &AGENT#" :ELSE : SET &AGENT# = GET_ATT(HOST) : PRINT "JOB: agent is preconfigured to &AGENT#" :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "WORKFLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"
:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :PRINT "WIN_TYP: &UC_WIN_TYP"
:SET &JOB_TYPE# = "INVALID - JOB Object Type" :IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "BAT" OR "KDO" OR "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" :ELSE : SET &UC_UNIX_TYPE = GET_ATT("UNIX_TYPE") : PRINT "UNIX_TYPE: &UC_UNIX_TYPE" : IF &UC_UNIX_TYPE = "SHELL_SCRIPT" OR "COMMAND" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &JOB_TYPE# = &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# : PRINT "HEADER: check OS successfully - runbook (&JOB_TYPE#) runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :ELSE : STOP NOMSG, 50, "HEADER: stop &JOB_TYPE# runbook because it's a &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# agent" :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BIN', &AGENT#) :PRINT "HEADER: agent bin directory &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#"
:SET &LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("LOGIN#")
:IF &LOGIN# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting login to &LOGIN#" :ELSE : SET &LOGIN# = GET_ATT(LOGIN) : PRINT "JOB: login is preconfigured to &LOGIN#" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN#

:IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &SEPARATOR_CHAR# = "\" :ELSE : SET &SEPARATOR_CHAR# = "/" :ENDIF
! Warning, this script doesn't work with Windows Universal Naming Convention :FILL &STRING_ARR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = ""
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRING_ARR#[])
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" <> ".." OR "." OR "" : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &STRING_ARR#[&VAR#] : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ENDIF : ELSE : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" EQ ".." : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) : SET &POS# = &POS# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &POS#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#); :IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF
:WHILE &END_CHAR# = "/" OR "\" : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# - 1 : IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : IF &END_CHAR# <> ":" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &LENGTH#) : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDWHILE

!retrieves the report and searches for a given text and returns the line :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,"REP","&checkForText#") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &UC4RB_RESULT_LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#

echo off
!following are sanity checks on the input data :IF STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_WAS_HOST#) = "" : SET &TARGET_LOCAL# = "TRUE" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# = "localhost" :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# = &UC4RB_WAS_HOST# :ENDIF
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN

! This Include is used in Process tab of Workflows, so that &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# is not available. ! Path to report will be normalized where it is used. ! GET RUNID OF WORKFLOW :SET &RUNID# = SYS_ACT_RESTART_ME_NR() :SET &RUNID# = FORMAT("&RUNID#", "") :SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BACKUP', &AGENT#) :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#/&$CLIENT#/&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#/&RUNID#" :SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT# = "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#/report.txt" :IF &$RUNMODE# EQ "NORMAL" : PUB &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#, , "TASK" : PUB &UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#, , "TASK" :ENDIF

!sets the errorcode to 0 and displays the infomessage :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,"REP","&checkForText#") :PROCESS &hnd# : PRINT &infoMessage# : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0 :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &hnd#

!Check Overwrite Agent Object :SET &AGENT_VALUE# = "AGENT#" :SET &AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&AGENT_VALUE#) !check if the agent link was not resolved :IF &AGENT# = "EXT:agent" : SET &AGENT# = "No_Agent_assigned" :ENDIF
!Check Overwrite Agent Object :SET &OVERWRITE_AGENT_VALUE# = "OVERWRITE_AGENT#" :SET &OVERWRITE_AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&OVERWRITE_AGENT_VALUE#) !check if the agent link was not resolved :IF &OVERWRITE_AGENT# = "EXT:/agent_assignment/agent" : SET &OVERWRITE_AGENT# = "" : PUB &OVERWRITE_AGENT#,,TASK :ENDIF :IF &OVERWRITE_AGENT# <> "" : SET &AGENT# = &OVERWRITE_AGENT# :ENDIF
! Check Overwrtie Login Object :SET &OVERWRITE_LOGIN_VALUE# = "OVERWRITE_LOGIN#" :SET &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&OVERWRITE_LOGIN_VALUE#) !check if the login link was not resolved :IF &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# = "EXT:/agent_assignment/login" : SET &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# = "" : PUB &OVERWRITE_LOGIN#,,TASK :ENDIF :IF &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# <> "" : SET &LOGIN# = &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# :ENDIF
! Check Target ID :SET &TARGET_ID_VALUE# = "TARGET_ID#" :SET &TARGET_ID# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&TARGET_ID_VALUE#) !check if the target id link was not resolved :IF &TARGET_ID# = "EXT:@target/system/id" : SET &TARGET_ID# = "" : PUB &TARGET_ID#,,TASK :ENDIF
!get the agent OS type :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "COMPONENT-FLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"
!publish values for subordinate tasks :PUB &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#,,TASK :PUB &AGENT#,,TASK :PUB &LOGIN#,,TASK
!get the agent OS type :PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "WORKFLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"

:IF &UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD# <> "" OR "--10" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = '&UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#' :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD ! fallback in case awk doesn't work if [ "x$1" != "xno_sudo_recursion" ]; then tmp=/tmp/sudo.$$.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID# echo >$tmp "[ -r /etc/profile ] &&& . /etc/profile" echo >>$tmp "[ -r .profile ] &&& . \"`pwd`/.profile\"" awk <"$0" >>$tmp '/^### START SUDO HERE ###$/ {echo=1} {if (echo) print}' echo "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" | sudo -S sh $tmp no_sudo_recursion rc=$? sudo -k rm $tmp exit $rc fi ### START SUDO HERE ### :ENDIF

:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#) :SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, " ,") :WHILE &POS# > 0 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, " ,", ",") : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, " ,") :ENDWHILE
:SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, ", ") :WHILE &POS# > 0 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUB(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, ", ", ",") : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, ", ") :ENDWHILE

HEADER.Title: Retrieves all Hosts from The Database

DOCU_Docu.DOC: ON/OFF Variable as alternative to yes/no. This variables were intended for the database-functions.

HEADER.Title: yes|no in the prompt, true| false in value

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
Basic building blocks for package development and bootstrapping new actions.
- Variables for dropdowns - Promptsets to select Agents - General purpose Includes

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :ATTACH_RES "PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.STORE", "ITPATOOL.JAR", C, N
:SET &ERRNR# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS( ,,"RETCODE") :IF &ERRNR# = 12 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0 :ENDIF
:SET &ERRNR# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS( ,,"RETCODE") :IF &ERRNR# = 12 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0 :ENDIF

:SET &USE_SUDO# = "No" :SET &PARAM_USE_SUDO# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RUNID#, UC4RB_USE_SUDO#) :SET &PARAM_SUDO_PASSWORD# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RUNID#, UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#) :SET &PARAM_SUDO_USER# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RUNID#, UC4RB_SUDO_USER#) :SET &login_user# = get_att(USERID) :IF &PARAM_USE_SUDO# = "Sudo" : IF &login_user# <> "root" : IF &PARAM_SUDO_PASSWORD# NE "" ! use SUDO with password : SET &USE_SUDO# = "Yes" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&PARAM_SUDO_PASSWORD#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD echo 'Validating sudoer ...' sudo -k sudo -S -p '' -v << EOF $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD EOF RC=$? if [ "$RC" -ne "0" ] ; then exit $RC fi : ELSE ! try with sudo nopass :SET &USE_SUDO# = "Yes" sudo -k sudo -p '' -v RC=$? if [ "$RC" -ne "0" ] ; then echo ERROR: SUDO password is blank. exit $RC fi ! use SUDO but didn't input SUDO_PASSWORD echo WARNING: SUDO password is blank, make sure that the current user has SUDO privileges WITHOUT password. : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF

! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different UNIX variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or doesn't exist CHECKME="&UC4RB_CHECKME#" echo $CHECKME ISDIR=0 ISFILE=0 EXIST=0 if [ -d "$CHECKME" ] ; then ISDIR=1 EXIST=1 else DIR=`dirname "$CHECKME"` BASE=`basename "$CHECKME"` cd "$DIR" > /dev/null 2>&1 RC=$? if [ "$RC" -eq "0" ] ; then if ls $BASE > /dev/null 2>&1 ; then ISFILE=1 EXIST=1 fi fi fi :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR($ISDIR) ISFILE($ISFILE) EXIST($EXIST)" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO

! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different Windows variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME#, '"', '""') :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#, '$', '`$') $CHECKME="&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#" $ISFILE="0" $ISDIR="0" $EXIST=Test-Path $CHECKME if ($EXIST -eq $True) { $EXIST="1" $ISDIR=Test-Path $CHECKME -pathtype container if ($ISDIR -eq $True) { $ISDIR="1" } else { $ISDIR="0" $ISFILE="1" } } else { $EXIST="0" } :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR($ISDIR) ISFILE($ISFILE) EXIST($EXIST)" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "WARN:" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#" : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDIF

!get the agent OS type :SET &AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("AGENT#")
:IF &AGENT# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting agent to &AGENT#" :ELSE : SET &AGENT# = GET_ATT(HOST) : PRINT "JOB: agent is preconfigured to &AGENT#" :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "WORKFLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"
:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :PRINT "WIN_TYP: &UC_WIN_TYP"
:SET &JOB_TYPE# = "INVALID - JOB Object Type" :IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "BAT" OR "KDO" OR "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" :ELSE : SET &UC_UNIX_TYPE = GET_ATT("UNIX_TYPE") : PRINT "UNIX_TYPE: &UC_UNIX_TYPE" : IF &UC_UNIX_TYPE = "SHELL_SCRIPT" OR "COMMAND" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &JOB_TYPE# = &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# : PRINT "HEADER: check OS successfully - runbook (&JOB_TYPE#) runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :ELSE : STOP NOMSG, 50, "HEADER: stop &JOB_TYPE# runbook because it's a &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# agent" :ENDIF
:SET &LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("LOGIN#")
:IF &LOGIN# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting login to &LOGIN#" :ELSE : SET &LOGIN# = GET_ATT(LOGIN) : PRINT "JOB: login is preconfigured to &LOGIN#" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN#
!get the agent working dir :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BIN', &AGENT#) :PRINT "JOB: Agent Working Directory is &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#"

:IF &$PLATFORM# = "UNIX" : IF &USE_SUDO# = "Yes" EOF : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RUNID#, UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#) : INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD : IF &PARAM_SUDO_PASSWORD# NE "" sudo -k sudo -S -s -p '' <<EOF $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD $SHELL &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# EOF : ELSE sudo -k sudo -s -p '' <<EOF $SHELL &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# EOF : ENDIF : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX rm -f '&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE#' : ENDIF :ENDIF

:IF &$PLATFORM# = "UNIX" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_SUDOERS : IF &USE_SUDO# = "Yes" : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) ! Normalize file path : SET &SEPARATOR_CHAR# = "/" : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR#, "\", "/")
: FILL &STRING_ARR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = ""
: SET &VAR# = 1 : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRING_ARR#[],SIZE)
: WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" <> ".." OR "." OR "" : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ELSE : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" EQ ".." : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) : SET &POS# = &POS# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR#, 1, &POS#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 : ENDWHILE : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR#/sudo&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.sh" echo "Creating temp file to sudo at &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# ..." cat - 1>&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# <<'EOF' : ENDIF :ENDIF

! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred echo something! ping -n 120 127.0.0.1 ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred echo something! ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

:SET &BNAME# = "/pgp" :SET &URL# = "https://prd-pw-microsites-us1n.s3.amazonaws.com/pgp/automictest3.gepower.com/" :PRINT &URL# :DEFINE &URLS#, string, 2 :FILL &URLS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&URL#,&BNAME#)
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&URLS#[])
:PSET &BASEURL# = &URLS#[1] :PSET &SHORTBASEURL# = STR_SUB(&BASEURL#,"https://","") :PSET &EXTURL# = STR_CAT(&BNAME#,&URLS#[2]) :PRINT "Full URL is &BASEURL#" :PRINT "Short URL is &SHORTBASEURL# " :PRINT "Extended URL is &EXTURL#"

:PSET &INSTANCENAME# = "ip-10-230-7-106.sbb01.spoc.global" :PRINT Instance Name is: &INSTANCENAME#
:DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 5 :FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&INSTANCENAME#,".") :PSET &AGENTNAMETEMP# = &STRINGS#[1] :PSET &AGENTNAME# = CONV_UC(&AGENTNAMETEMP#)
:PRINT Agent Name is: &AGENTNAME#

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :WAIT 20

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :IF &REMOVE_FROM_ACTIVE_LIST# eq "Y" : delete_var EC2.ACTIVE.INSTANCES, "&INSTANCEID#" : delete_var EC2.RUNNING.INSTANCES, "&INSTANCEID#" :ENDIF

XHEADER.Title: Email Connection Information for New Instance

NOTIFICATION.Subject: Your new EC2 Instance is ready
NOTIFICATION.Text:
Hello,
Your EC2 Instance is now running.
The Public IP of your instance is &PRIVATE_IP#. The Public DNS Name of your instance is &PRIVATE_DNS_NAME#.

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :WAIT 30

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :put_var EC2.ACTIVE.INSTANCES, "&instance_id#", "&private_dns_name#", "&launch_time#", "&ami_id#", "&private_ip#" :PSET &EC2_INSTANCEID# =&instance_id# :PSET &EC2_PRIVATE_DNS# =&private_dns_name# :PSET &EC2_PRIVATE_IP# =&private_ip# :PRINT Private IP is: &EC2_PRIVATE_IP#

XHEADER.Title: Get a list of all EC2 Instances

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:PRINT Instance List Raw: &INSTANCE_LIST#
:DEFINE &INSTANCES#, string, 50 :FILL &INSTANCES#[] = STR_SPLIT(&INSTANCE_LIST#,"i-")
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&INSTANCES#[])
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# :SET &INSTANCE_NAME# = STR_CAT("i-",&INSTANCES#[&VAR#])
:IF &INSTANCE_NAME# <> "i-" : PRINT "Instance Name Found: &INSTANCE_NAME#" : put_var EC2.RUNNING.INSTANCES, "&INSTANCE_NAME#", "&INSTANCE_NAME#" :ENDIF
:SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 :ENDWHILE

NOTIFICATION.Subject: Your new EC2 Instance is being stopped
NOTIFICATION.Text:
Hello,
Your EC2 Instance &INSTANCEID is being stopped.
It is currently in Status: &STATUS#

SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! :add_att RECIPIENT, &$USER#

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
! Define the AMI ID for the Image selected !:pset &ami_id#="ami-f6b4299e"
! Set the Connection Object based on Region !:put_att restConnection='&rest_conn#'
! Define size of Instance !:pset &instance_size#=get_var(EC2.QUERY_INSTANCE_SIZE)

XHEADER.Title: Tag instance for identification in EC2 mgmt console

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
:PSET &INSTANCENAME# = GET_VAR(EC2.ACTIVE.INSTANCES,&INSTANCEID#,4) :PRINT Instance Name is: &INSTANCENAME#
:DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 5 :FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&INSTANCENAME#,".") :PSET &AGENTNAMETEMP# = &STRINGS#[1] :PSET &AGENTNAME# = CONV_UC(&AGENTNAMETEMP#)
:PRINT Agent Name is: &AGENTNAME#
:PRINT Instance ID is: &INSTANCEID#
:PRINT Instance Name is: &INSTANCENAME#

NOTIFICATION.Subject: Your new EC2 Instance and Agent are being terminated
NOTIFICATION.Text:
Hello,
Your EC2 Instance &INSTANCEID# is being terminated. It is currently in Status: &STATUS#
The corresponding Agent &AGENTNAME# has also been terminated.

SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! :add_att RECIPIENT, &$USER#

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :SET &TMPSLEEP# = RANDOM(&SLEEPMIN#,&SLEEPMAX#) :SET &SLEEP# = FORMAT(&TMPSLEEP#,"00") :PRINT Sleep Time will be: &SLEEP# :SET &HOST# = GET_ATT(HOST) :PRINT Host is &HOST# :IF &HOST# EQ "<UNIX>" OR "<WIN>" : PRINT Host not Defined, skipping execution : STOP NOMSG :ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! :PRINT DB IP Adr in this environment is: 10.0.0.44 ping 127.0.0.1 -n &SLEEP# > nul echo &MESSAGE exit &RETCODE ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &NUM# = RANDOM(10,99) :SET &RANDNUM# = FORMAT(&NUM#,"00") :PRINT Num is &RANDNUM#, prob &OKPROBABILITY, is Restarted: &$RESTARTED# :IF &RANDNUM# LE &OKPROBABILITY : PRINT Finished Successfully :ELSE : PRINT Restart Count is: &$RESTARTED# : IF &$RESTARTED# EQ "N" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="Object Failed On Purpose!" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=99 : PRINT Aborting object! : ENDIF
:ENDIF

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI: :SET &TMPSLEEP# = RANDOM(&SLEEPMIN#,&SLEEPMAX#) :SET &SLEEP# = FORMAT(&TMPSLEEP#,"00") :PRINT Sleep Time will be: &SLEEP# :SET &HOST# = GET_ATT(HOST) :PRINT Host is &HOST# :IF &HOST# EQ "<UNIX>" OR "<WIN>" : PRINT Host not Defined, skipping execution : STOP NOMSG :ENDIF

SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! :PRINT DB IP Adr in this environment is: 10.0.0.44 ping 127.0.0.1 -n &SLEEP# > nul echo &MESSAGE exit &RETCODE ! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &NUM# = RANDOM(10,99) :SET &RANDNUM# = FORMAT(&NUM#,"00") :PRINT Num is &RANDNUM#, prob &OKPROBABILITY, is Restarted: &$RESTARTED# :IF &RANDNUM# LE &OKPROBABILITY : PRINT Finished Successfully :ELSE : PRINT Restart Count is: &$RESTARTED# : IF &$RESTARTED# EQ "N" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="Object Failed On Purpose!" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=99 : PRINT Aborting object! : ENDIF
:ENDIF

param.name: XC_P01
param.value: Could Not Retrieve Private IP Adress from previous job

param.name: XC_P02
param.value: Could Not Reach Host after 4 retries.. aborting.
